thread.title: Ashton Kutcher places investment on Unikrn
thread.title_full: Ashton Kutcher places investment on Unikrn | The Seattle Times

author: Matt Day
title: Ashton Kutcher places investment on Unikrn
text:
Unikrn, a Seattle e-sports startup, continues to tack on investors from the entertainment business.
The company Tuesday said Sound Ventures, the investment vehicle of actor and serial tech investor Ashton Kutcher and Madonna manager Guy Oseary, has joined its latest round of investment funding.
Unikrn didn’t disclose the size of the investment.
The company’s previous fundraising efforts , which included contributions from Dallas Mavericks owner Mark Cuban and investment vehicles founded by heirs to the Murdoch clan of News Corp. and the Redstones of CBS, totaled about $10 million.
 The company is aiming to capitalize on the fast growth of e-sports , as competitive video gaming is known. Unikrn hosts an online community for people to watch and bet on games played by teams of professional video gamers (though betting itself isn’t offered in the U.S., where sports gambling remains illegal in most places).
Also on Tuesday, Unikrn announced a new feature designed to encourage people to place bets on the platform, discuss Unikrn on social media, and answer trivia questions. Participants in the feature, dubbed Unikrn Global Arena, are eligible to win raffled prizes from makers of PC hardware makers and other companies.
